name: Sunperk Site Furnishings
tag_list: sunperk, site-furniture, park, benches, picnic, tables, trash, containers, recycling, bins, bike, racks, stanchions, rope, posts
overview:
Sunperk Site Furnishings is proud to be the manufacture of outdoor furniture. With over 20 years of integrated experience, we are committed to excellence in providing only the highest quality public site and street furniture at exceptional prices.

Sunperk offers a complete line of durable products made from recycled plastic materials, galvanized steel and stainless steel, including benches, picnic tables, trash receptacles, bike racks, retractable belt stanchions, crowd control barriers and so on. Our professional workmen and specialist, with great technical experiences and knowledge, are dedicated to provide our valued customers with the superior quality，attractive design and ultimate outdoor comfort.

Sunperk can customize to your specifications and request. We strive to innovate and ensure our valued customers to be satisfied with our finest feature, custom design and outstanding customer service. You can expect a premium value and impressive beauty in our long lasting site furnishings.
